game.name: C.A.R.S. - Creating A Ridiculous Shitshow
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A rebellious chaos sandbox where you weaponize junk, disrupt highway traffic, and engineer outrageous physics disasters to turn the morning commute into pure, glorious mayhem.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rebellious chaos sandbox where you weaponize junk, disrupt highway traffic, and engineer outrageous physics disasters to turn the morning commute into pure, glorious mayhem.
